name: Create hidden data stream with match all template

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.7-d4091c86e3200e715826f9b279e2dca677d64a47 "index template [match-all-hidden-template] has index patterns [*] matching patterns from existing older templates [.monitoring-logstash,.monitoring-es,.monitoring-beats,.monitoring-alerts-7,.monitoring-kibana] with patterns (.monitoring-logstash => [.monitoring-logstash-7-*],.monitoring-es => [.monitoring-es-7-*],.monitoring-beats => [.monitoring-beats-7-*],.monitoring-alerts-7 => [.monitoring-alerts-7],.monitoring-kibana => [.monitoring-kibana-7-*]); this template [match-all-hidden-template] will take precedence during new index creation"
